Uses of Interface
java.lang.foreign.Addressable

Packages that use AddressablePREVIEW
Package
Description
java.lang.foreign
Provides low-level access to memory and functions outside the Java runtime.

  • Uses of AddressablePREVIEW in java.lang.foreign

    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    MemoryAddressPREVIEW
    Preview.
    A memory address models a reference into a memory location.
    interface

    A memory segment models a contiguous region of memory.

    A variable argument list, similar in functionality to a C va_list.
